ingredients.item: ½ x 235g pack pak choi, sliced
1 cooked chicken breast, skinned and shredded
such as Thai Taste Folded Rice Noodles

instructions.step: Add the stock to a saucepan and bring to the boil. Add the white part of the pak choi with the diced pepper, chicken, yuzu and noodles, then cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in the green part of the pak choi and cook for 1 minute. Drizzle with a little toasted sesame oil and serve in deep bowls.
